alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 5:14PM CDT until May 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONTAGUE AND WESTERN COOKE COUNTIES... At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Lake Muenster, or 19 miles southeast of Nocona, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Muenster, St. Jo, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Prairie Point, Rosston, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Illinois Bend, Marysville, Sivells Bend and Myra. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
